intro: This document serves as a nomenclature guideline for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's Coastal Zones product, detailing land cover and land use (LC/LU) classification. It provides a comprehensive description of all level 5 classes within the Coastal Zones LC/LU nomenclature, including their geographical characteristics, input datasets, and interpretation methods. The guideline aims to ensure consistent and accurate mapping of coastal zones, aligning with the MAES ecosystem typology and maintaining compatibility with other European LC/LU products.
